title: dEvI nannu
sahitya:
dEvI nannu brOvavammA ipuDE manci samayamammA


anupallavi

  sEvinci ninnE sadA nammitini niratamuga nammitni


caraNam 1    anAtha rakSaki birAna brOvumu talli Ashrita janapAlini bhavAni dEvI lOka pAvani
    caraNam 2    parAku sEyaka varAlanosagumu tallI pAmarajana pAlini mrDAni dEvI trilOka janani
    caraNam 3    kumAra jananI kaTAkSa sEyumu tallI shyAmakrSNa pAlini purANi dEvI brhadambA
